The Shenda Jinshan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Shanxi Province, specifically in Baode County

operators: Shanxi Xinzhou Shenda Jinshan Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Xinzhou Shenda Jinshan Coal Industry Company, which is fully owned by Shanxi Xinzhou Shenda Energy Group.
